name: Homebuyer Counseling
description: Each month, we host bilingual Pre-purchase Homebuyer Education Workshops to help people become mortgage-ready and certified. Follow-up one-on-one Pre-purchase Counseling ensures homebuyers fully understand the home buying process and make an informed decision. Our workshops are currently offered in virtual, in-person, and self-paced learning formats. Languages ​​include English, Chinese Mandarin, and Cantonese.
